message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! It's a one-of-a-kind item that I think you'll really love. I'm willing to let it go for $200.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $120. Would you be willing to meet me halfway?
I understand that $200 is a bit steep for you, but I'm willing to compromise. I can do $175, which is a bit more than your offer but still a good deal for both of us. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit hesitant. Would you be willing to go down to $140?
I'm getting close to your offer, but I still need to make a profit. I can do $160, which is a bit higher than your offer but still a good compromise. What do you think?
I'm getting close to making a decision, but I'm still trying to stay within my budget. Would you be willing to meet me at $155?
